certs.name: AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
certs.description: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals demonstrates foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

certs.name: AEM Professional: Adobe Experience Manager Sites Developer
certs.description: Adobe Certified Professional - Adobe Experience Manager Sites Developer exam validates that the candidate has the knowledge and skills to work with Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) as a developer.
